description: Fitted through the hip and thigh with a streamlined leg and jogger cuff. Crafted in their bestselling stretch fabric that’s designed to feel like your sweats with design details for a polished, versatile look. Plant-rich fibres offer moisture management and antibacterial properties for less washing and comfort across seasons.
name: Duer No Sweat Joggers, 29" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 62% Cotton, 34% Tencel™ Lyocell, 3% Lycra® T400® Polyester, 1% Lycra® Spandex
